definition: highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: We offered them each three cups of barley wine.
sentences.chinese: 我们敬了他们每人三杯青稞酒。

sentences.english: It confirmed the best parameter of the extraction of the highland barley green.
sentences.chinese: 通过实验研究确定了青稞麦绿素的最佳提取工艺参数。

sentences.english: Where can I buy Xi'an highland barley wine?
sentences.chinese: 西安哪里可以买到青稞酒？

sentences.english: Researching the effect of the antioxidants and lipid peroxidation from Naked Barley.
sentences.chinese: 探讨青稞提取液抗氧化和脂质过氧化的作用。

sentences.english: Drinking the most aromatic highland barley wine.
sentences.chinese: 喝下那最香浓的青稞酒呀。

sentences.english: Those yellow things must be barley.
sentences.chinese: 那黄色的应该是青稞吧。

sentences.english: Those approaches were of great significance in improving the quality of highland barley liquor.
sentences.chinese: 这些措施的应用对提高青稞酒质量具有重要意义。

sentences.english: I drank some barley wine when I was visiting a Tibetan friend.
sentences.chinese: 在藏族朋友家里作客时，我喝到了青稞酒。

definition: variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
Takahashi (name)/Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture, Japan/Highbridge (name)
